name: POP DA CANDY
description:
Satisfying candy popping game with different color themes.

Just tap on the candies to destroy them in a chain reaction for full popping satisfaction.

How to play:

Pop the candies to drop the toy avatar to the bottom of the floor.

Pop more than 10 candies for a surprise!

Game Features:

Intuitive Gameplay

Easy to learn but hard to master

8 different color themes to play to

9 different unlock able toy avatars.

Simple gameplay with single tap action.
